title: Iran’s Foreign Minister, in Leaked Tape, Says Revolutionary Guards Set Policies
content:
1. Iran’s Foreign Minister, in Leaked Tape, Says Revolutionary Guards Set Policies  The New York Times
  2. Iran foreign minister criticises power of Qassem Suleimani in leaked interview  The Guardian
  3. Iran International report: Zarif accused Soleimani of directing Iranian foreign policy  Arab News
  4. Iran is serious about regional dialogue  Tehran Times
  5. Iran sympathizes with India as it grapples with dangerous COVID variant  PRESSTV
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
